scripts.install:all: npm install --prefix backend && npm install --prefix frontend
scripts.dev: npx concurrently --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "npm run dev --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
scripts.start: npx concurrently --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "npm start --prefix backend" "npm run dev --prefix frontend"
